p: The igraph package (version 1.2.2) ( Csardi & Nepusz, 2006) in R was used to analyze the topology of the protein–protein interaction network. The degree and betweenness of proteins in the protein–protein interaction network were calculated with the functions of degree() and betweenness(), respectively. The shortest path length between two proteins in the protein–protein interaction network was calculated with the function of shortest.paths().
